trans-unit.target: ) now deal with negative values correctly. (#169, #141)

trans-unit.target: , which is not). This makes debugging easier and seeding consistent. (#151)

trans-unit.target: . Previously this was possible, but unlikely to work as expected. (#202)

trans-unit.source: A backend for running Nengo models on Intel’s Loihi architecture.
trans-unit.target: A backend for running Nengo models on Intel’s Loihi architecture.

trans-unit.source: A more informative error message is raised if any encoders contain NaNs. (#251)
trans-unit.target: A more informative error message is raised if any encoders contain NaNs. (#251)

trans-unit.source: Added support for Distributions on Connection transforms.
trans-unit.target: Добавлена поддержка распределения по соединительным трансформаторам.

trans-unit.source: An error is now raised if a learning rule is applied to a non-decoded connection. (#103)
trans-unit.target: An error is now raised if a learning rule is applied to a non-decoded connection. (#103)

trans-unit.source: Better error messages are raised when attempting to simulate networks in which certain objects participating in a learning rule are on-chip. (#202, #208, #209)
trans-unit.target: Better error messages are raised when attempting to simulate networks in which certain objects participating in a learning rule are on-chip. (#202, #208, #209)

trans-unit.source: Connections from neurons with scalar transforms are now sparse internally. This allows much larger neuron->neuron connections with scalar transforms. (#226)
trans-unit.target: Connections from neurons with scalar transforms are now sparse internally. This allows much larger neuron->neuron connections with scalar transforms. (#226)

trans-unit.source: Emulator now fails for any cx_base < 0, except -1 which indicates an unused axon. (#185)
trans-unit.target: Emulator now fails for any cx_base < 0, except -1 which indicates an unused axon. (#185)

trans-unit.source: Ensemble intercept values are capped to 0.95 to fix issues with the current discretization method.
trans-unit.target: Значения перехвата ансамбля ограничены 0,95 для исправления проблем текущим методом дискретизации.

trans-unit.source: Ensure things in the build and execution happen in a consistent order from one build/run to the next (by using
trans-unit.target: Убедитесь,что в процессе сборки и исполнения все происходит в последовательном порядке от одной сборки/прогона к другой (с использованием

trans-unit.source: Filtering for probes on the chip is guaranteed to use floating-point now (so that the filtered output is correct, even if the underlying values are integers). (#169, #141)
trans-unit.target: Filtering for probes on the chip is guaranteed to use floating-point now (so that the filtered output is correct, even if the underlying values are integers). (#169, #141)

trans-unit.source: First public alpha release of Nengo Loihi! If you have any questions, please ask on our forum and if you run into any issues let us know.
trans-unit.target: First public alpha release of Nengo Loihi! If you have any questions, please ask on our forum and if you run into any issues let us know.

trans-unit.source: For more details and installation instructions, please see the documentation.
trans-unit.target: For more details and installation instructions, please see the documentation.

trans-unit.source: Increased minimum NengoDL version to 3.0 (and this transitively increases the minimum TensorFlow version to 2.0). (#259)
trans-unit.target: Increased minimum NengoDL version to 3.0 (and this transitively increases the minimum TensorFlow version to 2.0). (#259)

trans-unit.source: Internal classes and functions have been reorganized and refactored. See the pull request for more details. (#159)
trans-unit.target: Internal classes and functions have been reorganized and refactored. See the pull request for more details. (#159)

trans-unit.source: It is no longer possible to pass
It is now possible to make connections and probes with object slices (e.g.,
trans-unit.target: Теперь можно делать соединения и зонды с ломтиками объектов (например

trans-unit.source: It is now possible to slice the
Learning in the emulator more closely matches learning on hardware. (#139)
trans-unit.target: Learning in the emulator more closely matches learning on hardware. (#139)

trans-unit.source: Manually reset spike probes when Simulator is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Ручной сброс датчиков шипов при инициализации симулятора.

trans-unit.source: Models can now run with different
trans-unit.target: Модели теперь могут работать с разными

trans-unit.source: Models that do not run any objects on Loihi will raise an error.
trans-unit.target: Модели,которые не запускают никаких объектов на Loihi,приведут к ошибке.

trans-unit.source: Models trained using NengoDL use tuning curves more similar to those of neuron on the chip, improving the accuracy of these model. (#140)
trans-unit.target: Models trained using NengoDL use tuning curves more similar to those of neuron on the chip, improving the accuracy of these model. (#140)

trans-unit.source: Models will not be precomputed by default. To precompute models, you must explicitly pass
trans-unit.target: Модели не будут предварительно вычисляться по умолчанию.Чтобы прекомпилировать модели,вы должны явно передать

trans-unit.source: Nengo Loihi is now compatible with Nengo version 3.0.0. (#259)
trans-unit.target: Nengo Loihi is now compatible with Nengo version 3.0.0. (#259)

trans-unit.source: Nengo Loihi now requires NxSDK version 0.8.5. (#225)
trans-unit.target: Nengo Loihi now requires NxSDK version 0.8.5. (#225)

trans-unit.source: Nengo Loihi now requires NxSDK version 0.8.7 and supports NxSDK version 0.9.0. (#255)
trans-unit.target: Nengo Loihi now requires NxSDK version 0.8.7 and supports NxSDK version 0.9.0. (#255)

trans-unit.source: Nengo Loihi now requires at least NxSDK version 0.8.0. (#218)
trans-unit.target: Nengo Loihi now requires at least NxSDK version 0.8.0. (#218)

trans-unit.source: Nengo Loihi now supports NxSDK version 0.8.0. Versions 0.7.0 and 0.7.5 are still supported. (#188)
trans-unit.target: Nengo Loihi now supports NxSDK version 0.8.0. Versions 0.7.0 and 0.7.5 are still supported. (#188)

trans-unit.source: Neuron (spike) probes can now be filtered with
trans-unit.target: Зонды нейрона (шип)теперь могут быть отфильтрованы с помощью

trans-unit.source: New Nengo transforms are supported, including
trans-unit.target: Поддерживаются новые трансформации Ненго,в том числе

trans-unit.source: Noise now works correctly with small exponents on both the chip and emulator. Previously, the emulator did not allow very small exponents, and such exponents produced noise with the wrong magnitude on the chip. (#185)
trans-unit.target: Noise now works correctly with small exponents on both the chip and emulator. Previously, the emulator did not allow very small exponents, and such exponents produced noise with the wrong magnitude on the chip. (#185)

trans-unit.source: Now compatible with NxSDK 0.7. We are currently not supporting older versions of NxSDK, but may in the future.
trans-unit.target: Теперь совместима с NxSDK 0.7.В настоящее время мы не поддерживаем старые версии NxSDK,но возможно в будущем.

trans-unit.source: Obfuscated non-public information related to Intel’s NxSDK. (#228)
trans-unit.target: Obfuscated non-public information related to Intel’s NxSDK. (#228)

trans-unit.source: Objects in nengo-loihi will have the same random seeds as in nengo core (and therefore any randomly generated parameters, such as ensemble encoders, will be generated in the same way). (#70)
trans-unit.target: Objects in nengo-loihi will have the same random seeds as in nengo core (and therefore any randomly generated parameters, such as ensemble encoders, will be generated in the same way). (#70)

trans-unit.source: PES learning can now be done with multidimensional error signals.
trans-unit.target: Обучение PES теперь может осуществляться с помощью многомерных сигналов об ошибках.

trans-unit.source: PES learning in Nengo Loihi more closely matches learning in core Nengo. (#139)
trans-unit.target: PES learning in Nengo Loihi more closely matches learning in core Nengo. (#139)

trans-unit.source: Population spikes can now be used to send information more efficiently to the chip. Population spikes are necessary for larger models like those using CIFAR-10 data. (#161)
trans-unit.target: Population spikes can now be used to send information more efficiently to the chip. Population spikes are necessary for larger models like those using CIFAR-10 data. (#161)

trans-unit.source: Pre-alpha release of Nengo Loihi for testing at the 2018 Telluride neuromorphic engineering conference. Thanks to all participants who tried out this early version of Nengo Loihi and provided feedback.
trans-unit.target: Преальфа-релиз Nengo Loihi для испытаний на конференции по теллуридной нейроморфной инженерии 2018 года.Спасибо всем участникам,которые опробовали эту раннюю версию Nengo Loihi и предоставили свои отзывы.

trans-unit.source: Probes that use snips on the chip (when running with
trans-unit.target: Зонды,которые используют ножницы на чипе (при работе с

trans-unit.source: Run Nengo models on the Loihi chip
trans-unit.target: Запустите модели Ненго на чипе Лойхи.

trans-unit.source: Seeded networks that have learning are now deterministic on both emulator and hardware. (#140)
trans-unit.target: Seeded networks that have learning are now deterministic on both emulator and hardware. (#140)

trans-unit.source: Several fixes to filtering and connecting between objects on and off chip.
trans-unit.target: Несколько исправлений для фильтрации и соединения между объектами на чипе и вне чипа.

trans-unit.source: Simulator now gives a warning if the user requests a progress bar, instead of an error. This avoids potential problems in
trans-unit.target: Теперь симулятор выдает предупреждение,если пользователь запрашивает индикатор прогресса,а не ошибку.Это позволяет избежать потенциальных проблем в

trans-unit.source: Snips directory included when pip installing nengo-loihi. (#134)
trans-unit.target: Snips directory included when pip installing nengo-loihi. (#134)

trans-unit.source: Switched to nengo-bones templating system for TravisCI config/scripts. (#204)
trans-unit.target: Switched to nengo-bones templating system for TravisCI config/scripts. (#204)

trans-unit.source: The default intercept range set by
The neurons used to transmit decoded values on-chip can be configured. By default, we use ten pairs of heterogeneous neurons per dimension. (#132)
trans-unit.target: The neurons used to transmit decoded values on-chip can be configured. By default, we use ten pairs of heterogeneous neurons per dimension. (#132)

trans-unit.source: The splitting and passthrough removal procedures were significantly refactored, which fixed an issue in which networks could be modified in the splitting process. (#202, #211)
trans-unit.target: The splitting and passthrough removal procedures were significantly refactored, which fixed an issue in which networks could be modified in the splitting process. (#202, #211)

trans-unit.source: To use the backend, simply replace:
Transforms to on-chip neurons are now applied on-chip, which avoids scaling issues and large off-chip transforms. (#126)
trans-unit.target: Transforms to on-chip neurons are now applied on-chip, which avoids scaling issues and large off-chip transforms. (#126)

trans-unit.source: Tuning curves now take into account the Loihi discretization, improving accuracy on most models.
trans-unit.target: Кривые настройки теперь учитывают дискретизацию Loihi,повышая точность на большинстве моделей.

trans-unit.source: We integrate current (U) and voltage (V) more accurately now by accounting for rounding during the decay process. This integral is used when discretizing weights and firing thresholds. This change significantly improves accuracy for many networks, but in particular dynamical systems like integrators. (#124, #114)
trans-unit.target: We integrate current (U) and voltage (V) more accurately now by accounting for rounding during the decay process. This integral is used when discretizing weights and firing thresholds. This change significantly improves accuracy for many networks, but in particular dynamical systems like integrators. (#124, #114)

trans-unit.source: We no longer disable the Nengo decoder cache for all models. (#202, #207)
trans-unit.target: We no longer disable the Nengo decoder cache for all models. (#202, #207)

trans-unit.source: allocator, which allows networks to be run across multiple chips (multi-chip) by assigning each ensemble to a different chip in a round-robin format. This allocator can be selected using the
trans-unit.target: аллокатор,который позволяет работать сетям на нескольких микросхемах (мультичипах),присваивая каждый ансамбль разным микросхемам в круглосуточном формате.Этот аллокатор можно выбрать с помощью

trans-unit.source: have been moved to Nengo as part of this transition. The MNIST convnet example demonstrates the new syntax. (#142)
trans-unit.target: have been moved to Nengo as part of this transition. The MNIST convnet example demonstrates the new syntax. (#142)

trans-unit.source: neuron model on both the emulator and hardware backends.
trans-unit.target: модель нейрона как на эмуляторе,так и на аппаратном бэкэнде.

trans-unit.target: типы нейронов.Эти типы использовались только для кодирования значений узлов в шипах для отправки на микросхему,что можно сделать так же хорошо,как и для

trans-unit.source: package is now required to run Nengo Loihi. (#240)
trans-unit.target: package is now required to run Nengo Loihi. (#240)

trans-unit.target: to have effect. The exact minimum voltage on the chip is highly affected by discritization (since the chip only allows minimum voltages in powers of two), but this will at least provide something in the ballpark. (#169)
